meanings.definition: A lamp placed on a bedside table for reading or providing light in a bedroom.
meanings.sent1: At night, I always turn on the bedlamp before reading my favorite book.
meanings.sent2: The soft glow of the bedlamp illuminated the room as I prepared to sleep.
meanings.sent3: When the power went out, I used the bedlamp to tell spooky stories in the dark.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a cozy bedlamp on a winter night.
meanings.sent5: The bedlamp cast a warm and inviting light, creating a peaceful atmosphere in the bedroom.
